name: Upcoming Notice Due Dates
query:
SELECT
    name AS "Title:Link/Auditing Document:200",
    date AS "Date of Notice:Date:150",
    due_date_for_reply__action AS "Due Date:Date:150",
    company AS "Company:Data:200"
FROM
    `tabAuditing Document`
WHERE
    due_date_for_reply__action BETWEEN CURDATE() AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY)
ORDER BY
    due_date_for_reply__action ASC
